channel.title: St Mary's Bambalapitiya
channel.description: A starter blog demonstrating what Gatsby can do.

item.title: Weekly Masses
item.description: Weekday Monday, Tuesday and Thursday 6:00am, Wednesday and Friday 6:30pm 6:10pm Novena to the Holy Spirit before Wednesday evening mass. 6pm…
item.content:encoded:
Weekday

Monday, Tuesday and Thursday 6:00am, Wednesday and Friday 6:30pm 6:10pm Novena to the Holy Spirit before Wednesday evening mass. 6pm Adoration of the Blessed Sacrament before Friday evening mass.

Saturday

6:30am and 6:15pm

Sunday

7:00am *, 8:30am, 10:30am, 6:00pm.

  • 7:00am Mass 1st Sunday (Sinhala), 3rd Sunday (Tamil) Mass in English at 7:00am, at “Nirmala Chapel”, Clifford Place. All Masses are in English except where noted

test
